name: angies-laundry
description: Angie's Laundry Bar - A modern laundry management system

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.install-deps: concurrently "cd backend && npm install" "cd frontend && npm install"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd backend && npm run build" "cd frontend && npm run build"
